sentences.sContent: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.sCn: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

sentences.sContent: There is one database heap per database, and the database manager uses it on behalf of all applications connected to the database.
sentences.sCn: 每个数据库都有一个数据库堆，数据库管理器使用它来代表连接到数据库上的所有应用程序。

trans.tranOther: as the representative of sb or instead of them
